application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 Sycamore Crown lift branches over drive to height of alarm box approx 4-5m due to leaf drop, light and bird mess.Crown lift over pavement to 3m,Crown lift over neighbouring nursery to 3m, low branches interfering with pedestriansT2 Willow Reduce by half,Remove branch growing towards sycamores, interfering with neighbours and satellite dish, getting big for locationT3 Sycamore This garden side only;Reduce lowest branch to allow more light,Reduce overextending branches from crown back into shape,Reduce any branches to give at least 2m clearance from building,10% Thin ,Remove Deadwood,Cut back smaller leaning sycamore to boundary. Tree encroaching on building and blocking light from windows and gardenT4 Smaller Sycamore This garden side only; Reduce overextending tips with pole pruners,Remove Deadwood,10% Thin to allow more light. Tree blocking light and dropping deadwood over communal areasG1 Tree along back fence line: Reduce to height of fence, Cut back to boundary any overhanging. Mixed species low amenity value
